originalText.text: My experience with Boris far exceeded my expectations. I was greeted warmly upon entering this salon that has a cozy ambiance. Quickly, Boris was able to ascertain what my hair needed. I needed a haircut that would make my hair healthy and stylish. My hair was damaged by lots of color, so the goal was to revive the overall look by softening the ends. He was very helpful in giving me tips on how to keep my hair healthy that I had not known. Boris has a good nature that makes you feel relaxed and taken care of. My hair know looks refreshed and beautiful. I highly recommend seeing Boris, you will be in good hands.

originalText.text:
Amazing service.

I came in to get highlights and booked my appointment with Boris. My highlights came out beautifully. Boris walked me through the entire process and explained what he was going to do. At the end Boris & Ariel styled my hair & I feel brand new. I will definitely be coming back.

Fun atmosphere, everyone is kind and friendly.

originalText.text: If you are the type of person who truly values a high quality, tranquil, professional, fun, and a luxurious experience then Palms Salon is the right place for you. Starting off, Trish, who has been my hairstylist for many years is absolutely amazing in every aspect. Her energy is contagious, she's a hair integrity expert, and never fails to steer you in the wrong direction. She stands firm to her hair values and is truly an expert at what she does which is the main reason why I am still loyal to her till this day. If you ever decide to book her, then just know that you will leave feeling super refreshed and will gain a boost of confidence about yourself. For instance yesterday I was scheduled for a hair trimming appointment with her and I kid you not I left the salon feeling like a huge weight was lifted off my shoulders let alone confident. Words can't describe how thankful I am to have someone trustworthy that I can go to who truly values me as her client and genuinely cares about the integrity, health, and beauty of my hair. If you are reading this, thank you so much Trish for everything that you do! You are an angel!! Xoxo - EC

originalText.text: My experience at Palms Salon with Boris was so amazing! :) Before the service, the consultation provided by Boris was excellent and thorough, ensuring he understood exactly what I wanted. I went from dark brown to a gorgeous honey blonde balayage. The salon's beautiful atmosphere and the warm and friendly energy from the receptionist and the other stylists further enhanced the overall positive experience. I highly recommend Boris for his expertise and the exceptional service at Palms Salon. ❤️

originalText.text: I went to the salon almost a month ago and Vanessa did an amazing job with my hair. It was dried out and moreover she completely removed the color (which was a mix of green, blue, gray and brown) that came from a box dye bought at CVS. I’ll attach images below. Furthermore, all the staff in the salon are very friendly and I’ll definitely be coming back. Very grateful for their services.
